HI THERE,
I'M ANTHONY NGUYEN

I’m a senior ux designer at Comcast, head dreamer of PHLDesign and dedicated support player.

I am constantly looking for new design challenges, so feel free to reach out about potential freelance and pro bono projects.

I enjoy meeting new people, live streaming games, and helping grow the creative scene in Philadelphia.
